text: William Joseph Mullan (30 March 1928 â€“ 13 November 2018) was a Scottish football referee. He was born in Dublin, Republic of Ireland. In 1962, Mullan became a referee in the Scottish Division One. Three years later, he was appointed as a FIFA referee. In 1972, Mullan was selected as a referee for UEFA Euro 1972. Mullan died on 13 November 2018 in Edinburgh, Scotland at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Association football referees Category:Scottish sportspeople
title: William Mullan
